hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select EOIP.EOIP_ID, EOIP.CREATOR, EOIP.CREATE_TIME, EOIP.MODIFIER, EOIP.MODIFY_TIME, EOIP.REC_VER, EOIP.REC_STATUS, EOIP.ORG_ID, EOIP.TIME_ZONE, EOIP.PM_CODE, EOIP.EOIP_NAME, EOIP.EOIP_NAME_EN, EOIP.EOIP_REMARK, EOIP.EOIP_PRIORITY from EO_ISSUED_PARAM EOIP where 1=1 <<and EOIP.EOIP_ID LIKE '%' || :eoipId || '%'>> <<and EOIP.CREATOR LIKE '%' || :creator || '%'>> <<and EOIP.CREATE_TIME=:createTime>> <<and EOIP.MODIFIER LIKE '%' || :modifier || '%'>> <<and EOIP.MODIFY_TIME=:modifyTime>> <<and EOIP.REC_VER LIKE '%' || :recVer || '%'>> <<and EOIP.REC_STATUS LIKE '%' || :recStatus || '%'>> <<and EOIP.ORG_ID=:orgId>> <<and EOIP.TIME_ZONE LIKE '%' || :timeZone || '%'>> <<and EOIP.PM_CODE LIKE '%' || :pmCode || '%'>> <<and EOIP.EOIP_NAME like '%' || :eoipName || '%'>> <<and EOIP.EOIP_NAME_EN like '%' || :eoipNameEn || '%'>> <<and EOIP.EOIP_REMARK like '%' || :eoipRemark || '%'>> <<and EOIP.EOIP_PRIORITY LIKE '%' || :eoipPriority || '%'>> <<and EOIP.EOIP_NAME IN (:eoipNames)>> ${queryPlanSortSql}
